name: Westwind
description:
'''Westwind''' is a musical project from the French post-industrial scene, created by Kris G. (pseudonym of Christophe Gales). It mixes influences from musics such as [[Martial industrial]], [[Post-industrial (music)|Post-industrial]], [[Dark ambient]], [[Neofolk]] and [[Neoclassical (Dark Wave)|Neoclassical]] music.

Westwind started in 1999 by releasing self-produced and handmade CD-R's on its own label Black Sun Rising, which was dissolved in 2002. In 2003 Kris G. created the new label [[Steelwork Maschine]] together with Serge Usson of the bands [[Neon Rain]] and [[Storm Of Capricorn]].
